page.title: 03CRANWELL VILLAGE
page.content: The village of Cranwell is situated on the B1429 road five kilometres to the north-west of Sleaford in the county of Lincolnshire. The population of Cranwell village is about 920. Number 2, 4 and 6 Old School Lane are typical Lincolnshire cottages. Other interesting buildings include a farmhouse design at 19 College Road and an elegant and secluded house at 12 Sleaford Road. The terraced houses on North Road have pleasing textures provided by coursed stone and clay pantiles; these terraces also have outbuildings. There are several modern houses, most of which are situated on the new housing estate. There is no public house in the village, but there is an off-licence and also a social club.
